scripts.start: concurrently --names "Express,HealthCheck,UpdateExternal,EncryptTax,GitHubOAuth,MigrateUsers,KillSwitch" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/express/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/healthCheck/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/updateExternalStatus/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/encryptTaxId/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/githubOauth2/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/migrateUsersVersion/app.ts" "tsx -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/updateKillSwitchParameter/app.ts"
scripts.start:hotReload: concurrently --names "Express,HealthCheck,UpdateExternal,EncryptTax,GitHubOAuth,MigrateUsers,KillSwitch" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/express/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/healthCheck/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/updateExternalStatus/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/encryptTaxId/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/githubOauth2/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/migrateUsersVersion/app.ts" "tsx watch -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register src/functions/updateKillSwitchParameter/app.ts"
